name: John Lemon can't hurt you
description:
John Lemon isn't real,

he can't hurt you...

OR CAN HE?

Controls:

WASD - movement

Shift - Dash (long press = slow motion)

Space - Jump (long press = higher jump)

Shoot the rockets for power ups.

This game was made as a submission for the Brackeys Gamejam 2022.1 with the Theme "It is not real"

Art by:
RUSSELL (@MADKING)
SUSI (@SMOLSUSHIBABY)

Programming:

KIERAN (@WATER)
SEBASTIAN (@BEEPBOOP)
PHILIPP (me)
